infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Pillaflow uses the camera to let you scan/attach photos within the app.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Pillaflow uses the library of the user to attach an image for profile appearance
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This adds the image that the user chose to the app to set their profile picture
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Pillaflow uses your calendar to import events into tasks and export tasks to your device calendar.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Pillaflow reads your steps and activity calories to keep your daily health metrics in sync.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Pillaflow can write your daily nutrition totals to Apple Health when nutrition sync is enabled.
